data: MDGNN Xu et al. (2024)
Multi-relational graph containing industry and institutional relationships
Hierarchical graph embedding with ALIBI positional encoding
IC improvement: 15% (CSI300) more robust performance on large datasets
MASTER Li et al. (2024b)
Modeling dynamic stock correlations through alternative attention
Market-guided gating mechanism for feature selection
Ranking profit: +13% Portfolio profit: +47% (CSI300, CSI800)
DoubleAdapt Zhao et al. (2023)
Dual adaptation for distribution shift in streaming data
Multi-head transformation layers for feature and label adaptation
Consistent improvement across LSTM, GRU, Transformer implementations. Model-independent compatibility
DPA-STIFormer Yan and Tan (2024)
Feature-centric temporal modeling
Dual path mechanism with adaptive gating
Superior performance across CSI500, CSI1000, NASDAQ, NYSE. Improved IC and Sharpe Ratio

Dual attention network for complex institutional interactions
Return: 16.97% Sharpe Ratio: 4.628 (CSI300E)
GINN Xu et al. (2024)
Integrating GARCH theory with neural networks
GARCH-based regularization in the LSTM loss function
Consistent high performance across 7 global indices. Robust zero-shot performance
DIFFSTOCK Daiya et al. (2024)
Diffusion models for market prediction
Adaptive noise scheduling for stock volatility
Sharpe Ratio improvement: NYSE: +7.92% NASDAQ: +6.18%
Wang et al. (2024b)
